oai_dc:dc.dc:title: President Roosevelt greeting Lieut-Colonel Edgerly at Chickamauga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of President Theodore Roosevelt greeting Lieutenant-Colonel Edgerly of the 7th U.S. Cavalry at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. There is a group of unidentified people behind them, some on horses and others seated on a porch. Features an undivided back and narrative on obverse. [No. 502]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Lookout Mountain (Tenn.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Presidents; Horses; National parks & reserves; People
